content.text: Good! I'm a radio DJ with a sweet tooth.
That sounds like a cool job, what kind of music do you play?
I love pop and rock music, but I play a wide variety of music.
Nice! I'm a bit of a memory buff, I love to learn new things and keep my mind sharp.
That's great! I'm always looking for new things to learn.
My biggest challenge was accepting that my whining was getting in the way of my relationships.
That's good to hear, I know how hard it can be to admit when you're wrong.
Thanks! I'm always looking for ways to improve myself.
I recently lost my job, but I'm looking forward to finding something new.
I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm sure you'll find something great.
Thanks! I'm optimistic about my future.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great things.
